content.brief:
By taking simple steps and remaining vigilant, you can prevent yourself from becoming a victim of hackers. The following is a collection of tips and guides to help keep you safe online. This is not an exhaustive list and all users are encouraged to help grow the repository by providing feedback to OMBCyber@omb.eop.gov.

Cyber.gov is the website of the Office of Management and Budget’s Cyber and National Security Unit (OMB Cyber), the United States Chief Information Security Officer, and the Chief Information Security Officers Council. Cyber.gov serves as a central collection of cybersecurity tips, best practices, and other resources that inform the public on how to protect themselves from cybersecurity threats.
content.extended: Discover easy steps you can take to improve your cybersecurity
content.micro: Easy steps you can take to reduce your vulnerability to cybersecurity threats.
